Method Detail

checkPage

void checkPage()
               throws org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.SmartFrogLivenessException,
                      java.rmi.RemoteException
Check the page, regardless of whether the component is enabled or not. This is the programmatic option.

Throws:
org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.SmartFrogLivenessException - for an http error
java.rmi.RemoteException - for network problems
